snippet.title: Hotel Architect - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at gameplay in this trailer for Hotel Architect, an upcoming hotel construction and tycoon game coming soon to Early Access.

Build, design, and impress whilst unleashing your entrepreneurial passion across the globe in Hotel Architect. Step into the shoes of a hotel owner in a 24/7 business where sleeping is only for the guests and feedback is key!
